name: Project Paragon Demo
description:
Richter, Kress and Prishe are sent to Brighton to retrieve an artifact. What mysteries will they find there? Why is the city in lockdown? And why are there so many goblins!?

Experience a fun little adventure - a small part of a greater story -  in this demo for an RPG in development, made by a hobbyist in his spare time.

Controls:
  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Action: Z, Enter, Space
  • Cancel/Menu: X, Esc
  • Dash: Shift
  • Prev/Next Page: Q and W

Oh. And, uhh, game pad support. Go wild.

Follow me on twitter if you want: https://twitter.com/Mystal8
